conversation_history.content: Hello! Welcome to the Employment Verification System. Let's start by collecting some information. What is your full name?
hello welcome to the employment verification system
Nice to meet you, hello! How many years of experience do you have?
I have totally 5.2 years of experience
Great! What is your date of birth? Please say it in a format like day, month, year.
Thank you, hello! Now, please provide your email address so I can check our records.
I couldn't find any employment records for john doe. Could you please tell me your current company name?
current company name is Oscar or Digital Private Limited
Thank you! I've recorded your company as current company name is Oscar or Digital Private Limited. Your verification is complete, hello!
You're very welcome, John! Thanks for your time, and have a wonderful day!
